entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
